author: andschwa
body: Library is NOT included in CoreCLR, and PSVersionInfo.GetBuildVersion   called System.Diagnostics.FileInfo.GetVersionInfo   which indirectly brought in a dependency on System.Reflection.Metadata. Patched relevant monad code to avoid this dependency. VSO create date - 10/6/2015 15:41:00     VSO closed date - 10/6/2015 15:42:00
title: Fix monad for lack of System.Reflection.Metadata
